app.mixins package¶

Submodules¶

app.mixins.meta_mixin module¶

The module defines a mixin class for SQLAlchemy models that provides utility methods for interacting with related metadata entries stored in separate meta tables.

class app.mixins.meta_mixin.MetaMixin[source]¶

Bases: object

Mixin class for adding to SQLAlchemy model classes that store extra data in *_meta tables. The class provides methods for working with metadata, such as getting and setting values, changing values that represent integers. The metadata class should not be related to any classes other than the parent SQLAlchemy model.

get_meta(meta_key: str) → DeclarativeBase | None[source]¶

Retrieves the metadata object associated with the given metadata key, or returns None if not found.

property meta_relationship: str¶

Returns the name of the relationship attribute on the parent model that links to the metadata entries.

set_meta(meta_key: str, meta_value: str)[source]¶

Sets or updates the metadata value for the given key by either modifying an existing entry or appending a new one.
